message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,000,000 significantly undervalues the product's true worth. Let's meet in the middle â€“ I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,200,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll propose $1,050,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Bob, I appreciate your efforts to find common ground.  While $1,050,000 is closer to a fair deal, I'm targeting a minimum of $1,150,000 for this.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and generate significant value for you.
I understand your confidence in the product's value, but I need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,080,000, but no higher. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle and make a deal.
